name: I'm a cowboy: Western Shooter
description:
I'm a cowboy: Western Shooter is a top-down shooter. Kill your enemies, complete missions and learn the story of the main character.
Revolvers, shotguns, dynamite and even machine guns you can use in battle.
24 dynamic missions will not let you get bored and relax.

See if you can kill them all!



  • Stylish graphics;
  • Dynamic skirmishes
  • Ability to ride a horse
  • Boss shooting
  • Timed Survival Mode
